content: Cricket ground The **Indian Association Ground** is a [cricket](/wiki/Cricket) ground in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It has hosted matches in the [2009 ICC World Cricket League Division Six](/wiki/2009_ICC_World_Cricket_League_Division_Six) and the [2012 ICC World Cricket League Division Five](/wiki/2012_ICC_World_Cricket_League_Division_Five) tournaments, and qualification matches for the [2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup](/wiki/2018_Under-19_Cricket_World_Cup). It hosted matches in the [Regional Finals](/wiki/2018%E2%80%9319_ICC_T20_World_Cup_Asia_Qualifier#Regional_Finals) of the [2018â€“19 ICC T20 World Cup Asia Qualifier](/wiki/2018%E2%80%9319_ICC_T20_World_Cup_Asia_Qualifier) tournament in July 2019. ## List of centuries ### Twenty20 Internationals No.ScorePlayerTeamBallsInns.Opposing teamDateResult1106[*](/wiki/Not_out)[Paras Khadka](/wiki/Paras_Khadka) [Nepal](/wiki/Nepal_national_cricket_team)522 [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore_national_cricket_team)28 September 2019Won This article about a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) sports venue is a stub.
